markdown.markdown:
```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggridges)
library(geofacet)

med <- read_csv("2021-child-and-adult-health-care-quality-measures_0.csv") 

med %>% 
  mutate(rate = as.numeric(`State Rate`)) %>% 
  mutate(adjRate = case_when(`Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Percentage") ~ -rate + 100,
                             `Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Ratio") ~ -rate + 100,
                             `Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "1,000") ~ -rate + 1000,
                             `Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "100,000") ~ -rate + 100000,
                             TRUE ~ rate)) %>% 
  mutate(rateType = case_when(startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Percentage") ~ "Percentage",
                              startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Ratio") ~ "Ratio",
                              str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "1,000") ~ "Rate of 1,000",
                              str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "100,000") ~ "Rate of 100,000",
                              TRUE ~ "Other")) %>% 
  mutate(flipped = ifelse(`Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure", 
                          TRUE, FALSE))

```

```{r, eval=FALSE}

med %>% 
  filter(rateType == "Percentage",
         State != "Puerto Rico",
         State != "Dist. of Col.") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(adjRate, Domain, fill = State)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = .5, guides = "none") +
  facet_geo(~ State) +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")


med %>% 
  filter(rateType == "Percentage",
         State != "Puerto Rico",
         State != "Dist. of Col.") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(adjRate, State, fill = State)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = .5) +
  facet_wrap(~ Domain, ncol = 5, scales = "free_x") +
  scale_y_discrete(limits = rev) +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```

```{r, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggridges)
library(geofacet)

med <- read_csv("2021-child-and-adult-health-care-quality-measures_0.csv") 

med %>% 
  mutate(rate = as.numeric(`State Rate`)) %>% 
  mutate(adjRate = case_when(`Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Percentage") ~ -rate + 100,
                             `Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Ratio") ~ -rate + 100,
                             `Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "1,000") ~ -rate + 1000,
                             `Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure" &
                             str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "100,000") ~ -rate + 100000,
                             TRUE ~ rate)) %>% 
  mutate(rateType = case_when(startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Percentage") ~ "Percentage",
                              startsWith(`Rate Definition`, "Ratio") ~ "Ratio",
                              str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "1,000") ~ "Rate of 1,000",
                              str_detect(`Rate Definition`, "100,000") ~ "Rate of 100,000",
                              TRUE ~ "Other")) %>% 
  mutate(flipped = ifelse(`Measure Type` == "Lower rates are better for this measure", 
                          TRUE, FALSE))

```

```{r, eval=FALSE}

med %>% 
  filter(rateType == "Percentage",
         State != "Puerto Rico",
         State != "Dist. of Col.") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(adjRate, Domain, fill = State)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = .5, guides = "none") +
  facet_geo(~ State) +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")


med %>% 
  filter(rateType == "Percentage",
         State != "Puerto Rico",
         State != "Dist. of Col.") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(adjRate, State, fill = State)) +
  geom_density_ridges(alpha = .5) +
  facet_wrap(~ Domain, ncol = 5, scales = "free_x") +
  scale_y_discrete(limits = rev) +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```
